actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that energy be conserved by the elimination of pilot lights on gas stoves.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that each citizen of the United States who utilizes a gas stove conserve natural gas by eliminating pilot lights on such stoves.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that energy be conserved by the elimination of pilot lights on gas stoves.
